ni.protobuf.types.extended_property_conversion
==============================================

.. py:module:: ni.protobuf.types.extended_property_conversion

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Methods to convert between ExtendedPropertyDictionaries and AttributeValue maps.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   ni.protobuf.types.extended_property_conversion.extended_properties_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.extended_property_conversion.extended_properties_from_protobuf


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: extended_properties_to_protobuf(extended_properties)

   Convert an ExtendedPropertyDictionary to an AttributeValue map.


.. py:function:: extended_properties_from_protobuf(attributes, extended_properties)

   Convert an AttributeValue map and insert values into an ExtendedPropertyDictionary.
